title: Oceanic Pro League
body: Hi, I'm here to talk about the OCE Team going to All Stars in Barcelona this year. And I see that Reydere is in the team.... I thought reydere retired from competitive League of Legends?

replies.body:
(Sorry for a late reply) 
Raydere has retired you're correct! 
The eligibility of competing in the all star event is to have competed in 20% of the Summer split of the OPL. Raydere did play the entire split, thus is eligible for being voted for and voila, got in!

I'm pretty sure he just moved to dire wolves but he keeps talking about retiring so there is bound to be some confusion there. He hasn't looked that great recently so I won't be surprised if he did retire and follow other career options at some point in the not so distant future.
